subject: re:Can't afford medications you need?
body:
Dear valued member.
Buy your medications from the comfort of your home and save up to 20% on pharmaceutical products with MyCanadianPharmacy. 
High quality Canadian medications for the price lower than for American drugs.Visit now. You have a chance to receive a Spring discount.
To order your medications just click here and follow step-by-step instructionshttp://posepass.hk
Safety, confidentiality of your information and secure purchasing guaranteed.Spring discounts for all the customers.
Yours,Dacia Hackett
